sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: The research was approved by the Biomedical Research Ethics Committee of the University of KwaZulu Natal. The Chairpersons of the CCMs in each country, which in all cases were senior government officials, also gave approval for case studies to be developed. Key informants were requested to provide verbal informed consent prior to interviews commencing or meetings or other events being observed.
